Basic

Checkbox will automatically detect the input’s type and render proper styles.

javascript $("input[type=checkbox], input[type=radio]").checkbox();

markup <fieldset> <label for="check_1">Checkbox</label> <input type="checkbox" name="check_1" id="check_1" value="on"> </fieldset> <fieldset> <label for="radio_1">Radio</label> <input type="radio" name="radio_1" id="radio_1" value="on"> </fieldset>

Toggle

Checkbox can also render a ‘toggle’ style checkbox.

javascript $("input[type=checkbox]").checkbox({ toggle: true });
